id: Stacey Abrams’s Non-Concession Concession 							Stacey Abrams’s Non-Concession Concession
paragraph:
National ReviewWe were told just days ago by all the great and good in the media when Martha McSally conceded that gracious losing is absolutely essential to our democracy. Well, here’s Stacey Abrams explicitly saying in her concession speech that she’s not conceding and, basically, alleging a dire plot to deny her the Georgia governorship, and assuredly almost no one who praised McSally will utter a peep of protest.NR's afternoon roundup of the day's best commentary & must-read analysis.
